document.full_text: rafa nadal and roger federer will meet in the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open after the old rivals advanced to the last four in contrasting fashions thursday.
document.title: federer moves into semis after simon retires
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal and roger federer will meet in the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open after the old rivals advanced to the last four in contrasting fashions thursday.
